document.full_text: police in algeria's capital used teargas on wednesday to disperse a crowd of young men who threw stones and petrol bombs to try to stop bulldozers demolishing dozens of illegally built homes.
document.title: algerian police clash with rioters in housing row
lines_and_colors: police in algeria's capital used teargas on wednesday to disperse a crowd of young men who threw stones and petrol bombs to try to stop bulldozers demolishing dozens of illegally built homes.
